LEGACY paused as the others talked of being converted into transmetals.

Even BUMP and SANTON did a doubletake.

"You misunderstand me." LEGACY intoned coldly. "I did not say that the
infection was attempting to convert you into transmetal incarnations
of yourselves, I said that it was stripping you of your organic parts
and converting you into a pure cybertronian."

SANTON walked over to the console LEGACY was working on, "And what
will happen after that?"

Turning to regard SANTON there was a thoughtful pause from LEGACY.
"Unknown." He said finally. "However I would surmize that since this
was utilized as a weapon that it would cause further harm at that
point."

"Agreed." SANTON said, "Why go through the trouble of weaponizing it
if it did nothing?"

BUMP looked up from his own PADD and glanced at TUCSON and NIGHTSHIFT
before looking at LEGACY, he had obviously been looking over some of
the same figures. "Maybe though going tranmetal though will help stall
or even reverse the affect."

There was a thoughtful look from LEGACY as he took in the information,
"Perhaps." He said. "Let me analyze." LEGACY began scanning
NIGHTSHIFT's leg.

(TAG)

- Preston
